definition: to volunteer for military service/to offer oneself for an assignment
to ask/to invite/please (do sth)/to treat (to a meal etc)/to request
tassel/sth shaped like a tassel (e.g. a leaf etc)/ribbon

sentences.english: As team captain, Darius volunteered to take the shots.
sentences.chinese: 作爲隊長，達利斯主動請纓去罰球。

sentences.english: Sandberg volunteered to oversee sales and operations for the project.
sentences.chinese: 桑德伯格主動請纓監督這一項目的銷售和運營。

sentences.english: None of us had any idea what DB2 was, but I volunteered.
sentences.chinese: 沒人瞭解DB2，但是我主動請纓。
